definition: to feed on growing herbage, attached algae, or phytoplankton
to eat small portions of food throughout the day
examples: She was grazing on snacks all afternoon.

definition: to crop and eat in the field
to feed on the herbage of
to put cattle to graze on
to supply herbage for the grazing of
examples: That pasture will graze 30 head of cattle.

definition: herbage for livestock to feed on

examples: The car's wheel grazed the curb.
grazed her knee when she fell

definition: to touch or rub against something in passing
a scraping along a surface or an abrasion made by it, a superficial abrasion of the skin
examples: had a slight graze on her knee from falling
